data.text: Fola kuzeleka goya kusinda lufufu lwinji,
Wawele na lufufu na wazunwa wangiwhana hela.
Yawele na luhala kanguzonaga mbuli zihile na kivisa,
Kunyenyetela na kumdumba Mkulu Nguluwi,
Nzila ya mwihe naimema miwa na midiwa,
Umlanguse mwana ndaze vyoilinguganigwa kikala goya,
Yawele na lufufu kangumlongozaga mzunwa,
Yalingunyala kubunza kobeta lihile,
Yawele na isungu kotambichizwa,
Muwinje yalingubeza, ivuche lyokwajilila,
Yalingugana nhumbula inojile na yalingugana ulonzi wa isungu,
Mkulu Nguluwi kangwamilaga malanguso ga kukomya,
Mgata kangulongaga, â€œSiweza kuluta kunze,
Mlomo wa mng'hondwa ndo ikulubila liwele ng'wemang'wema,
Mwana kanguganaga mbuli za chipoka mnhumbula,
Yalingumbunza mzunwa leka kiyonjezela lufufu,
Uwiche goya ikutu leka uhulichize ulonzi wa wawele na luhala,
Hegwe kosangalala wone kogawika mnhumbula,
Ila kitumbila kwa hegwe kuwe kwa Mkulu Nguluwi,
Nandikwandichila nhelo makumi gadatu,
leka kukulangusa gawele ga hachi na ga kukomya,
Uleche kumbunza mzunwa kwa vila ka mzunwa,
kwa vila Mkulu Nguluwi komlewela,
Uleche kuwa habehi na yalinguzudila himahima,
leka uleche kilangusa madito ga heye,
Uleche kuwa yumwe wa wala walinguwika kulagana kumlipila yunji,
Wone uwe ulihela chinhu cha kulipa,
Uleche kusa ulajilo wa mbaka ja katali,
Ndaze, hana munhu yawele na uwanzi kuli mijito ja heye?
